scripts.build: yarn run build:rm && yarn run build:mkdir && yarn run build:cp && yarn run build:js
scripts.build:cp: cp src/chrome/manifest.json dist/chrome/manifest.json && cp src/chrome/images/* dist/chrome/images
scripts.build:js: yarn run build:js:amazon && yarn run build:js:background && yarn run build:js:booklog && yarn run build:js:bookmeter && yarn run build:js:tsutaya-log && yarn run build:js:bell-alert
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:eslint && yarn run lint:fixpack
scripts.pack: yarn run build && yarn run pack:firefox && yarn run pack:chrome
scripts.pack:chrome: cd dist/chrome && sed -i '' -e '10,15d' manifest.json && zip -r ../amakankan-chrome.zip images js manifest.json
scripts.pack:firefox: cp -r dist/chrome dist/firefox && cd dist/firefox && zip -r ../amakankan-firefox.zip images js manifest.json
scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run build
scripts.watch: yarn run build && yarn run watch:cp & yarn run watch:amazon & yarn run watch:background & yarn run watch:booklog & yarn run watch:bookmeter & yarn run watch:tsutaya-log & yarn run watch:bell-alert
